mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NAME , CASE MEMBER_GENDER WHEN 'M' THEN '남' WHEN 'F' THEN '여' ELSE '?' END AS MEMBER_GENDER , SF_GET_CODE_NAME('AA',MEMBER_POSITION) AS MEMBER_POSITION , MEMBER_JOB FROM MEMBER A, VILLAGE B WHERE A.VILLAGE_SEQ = B.VILLAGE_SEQ AND B.VILLAGE_USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY A.MEMBER_NAME DESC
SELECT VILLAGE_SEQ , VILLAGE_NAME FROM VILLAGE WHERE VILLAGE_USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY VILLAGE_NAME
SELECT A.CLASS_NAME, CODE_NO, CODE_NAME FROM CLASS_CODE_MASTER A, CODE_DETAIL B WHERE A.CLASS_CODE = B.HIGHER_CLASS_CODE AND CLASS_CODE = #{classCode} AND USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT '청년 수' AS VILLAGE_NAME , COUNT(*) AS VILLAGE_CNT FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_POSITION NOT IN ('4','5','6') UNION SELECT B.VILLAGE_NAME , COUNT(B.VILLAGE_NAME) AS VILLAGE_CNT FROM MEMBER A, VILLAGE B WHERE MEMBER_POSITION NOT IN ('4','5','6') AND A.VILLAGE_SEQ = B.VILLAGE_SEQ GROUP BY B.VILLAGE_NAME
